parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Proportionaly increase/decrease unit's recoil. Drives muzzle up with every shot when supplied positive number and down when negative. 0 cancels recoil.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unitName '''setUnitRecoilCoefficient''' coefficient

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> coefficient: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[setUnitRecoilCoefficient]] 10</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[unitRecoilCoefficient]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Arma 2: Operation Arrowhead: New Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on March 28, 2015 - 11:50 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Benargee|Benargee]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Doesnt seem to work on AI or remote controlled units. Setting the value too high, positive or negative produces some interesting recoil animations.
</dd>
</dl>
